introduction: I am Aryan Maurya, a B.Tech student in Computer Science Engineering at IIT Bhilai, with a strong foundation in computer science and a passion for technology. I am an aspiring software developer seeking an internship at Predusk to apply and expand my technical skills in a dynamic environment.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science

work_experience.description: Managed over 10+ websites using WordPress, focusing on optimization and user engagement. Developed strategies to improve site rankings and visibility, leveraging analytical and problem-solving skills.
Designed and developed CasyMag, a case management app with a Firebase backend, using Flutter and real-time data management.
Developed multiple websites using React for the frontend and Node.js with Express.js for the backend. Implemented Redux for state management.

projects.name: Forum Website
projects.description: Built an interactive forum using PHP, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring user authentication and post management.

projects.name: PHP Compiler
projects.description: Created a compiler from scratch using Lex and Yacc.

projects.name: Resource Sharing Website
projects.description: Built an interactive resource-sharing website for IIT Bhilai students to access course materials in an organized way, reducing resource-hunting time.

hobbies_interests: Exploring the intersection of technology and creativity
